title: SR Kalyanamandapam
overview: The plot revolves around a family that owns SR Kalyanamandapam, where marriages are conducted from ages. Dharma (the father) fails to take care of the business. Unknown Conflicts occur between the father and the son. Kalyan comes to restore his familyâ€™s pride, falls in love with Sindhu. How does Kalyan settle the issues and solve the conflicts?
